General.Name: Shengyi Electronics Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shengyi Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of various printed circuit boards in China. The company provides line card, backplane, HDI, and rigid flex printed circuit boards. Its products are used in communication equipment, network equipment, computer/server, automotive electronics, consumer electronics, industrial control manufacturing, medical, aerospace, and other industries. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Dongguan City, China. Shengyi Electronics Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Guangdong Shengyi Technology Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No.33 Tong Zhen Road, Dongguan City, China, 523039
